plugins.name: coding-assistant
plugins.description: A comprehensive coding assistant that helps developers in their daily work. Provides expert guidance on code quality, planning, and implementation while respecting your project's architecture and conventions.

plugins.name: research-assistant
plugins.description: Comprehensive research and analysis toolkit with specialized agents for market research, competitive intelligence, trend analysis, and data investigation. Delivers actionable insights through expert research methodologies.

plugins.name: dev-pipeline
plugins.description: Structured 4-stage development pipeline enforcing Product Owner → Lead Developer → Senior Developer → Code Reviewer workflow. Use /feature to start a new feature with mandatory approval gates, thorough requirements gathering, technical planning, clean implementation, and comprehensive code review.
